name: Twilight Tempo
description:
Experience a rhythmic arcade game like no other!

In this game, listening is key! Memorize the patterns and destroy the evil diamonds!

This game was made in 2 weeks for Gamemaker's Notice-Me game jam. The theme was "The night changed everything". It was my second time participating in a game jam.

If you have OperaGX you can play the online web version and compete in the online leaderboards here

Controls

F4 / F11 - Fullscreen

ESC - Quit

Arrow Keys / WASD / D-PAD / Left & Right Joystick - Move

Any Other Key - Select
